name: Under (MINITOM_Official)
description:
Controls ,  W A S D , SPACE jump , Left Mouse Click Punch 

The main character is a normal human and he is 25 years old. He works in a factory and his 

name is called Jack, He has been working in the factory for years. Jack knows how to use 

tools and he is strong.In the game Jack can use different weapons such as swords , guns 

and tools for breaking down walls.

 He is also a happy character because Jack likes working in the factory and when he destroys the enemies he is brave, and Jack gets very happy because he knows that he is getting closer to the end so Jack can go back to his house. The reason why Jack goes on this adventure is because his factory has fallen down and at the end of the game he needs to get this diamond and when he touches it the factory rebuilds itself.
